description:
Episode 3.5 will be an audio commentary by Satomi Miura as Momoka Hanaoka and Hikaru Isshiki as Kanade Ayase. Please enjoy the cast`s review of "`You can touch me for only one minute...` The secret rule of the share house" and "Episode 1"!
Source: http://animefesta.iowl.jp/titles/1538 [The Share House`s Secret Rule]

titles.title: オーディオコメンタリー
